summary: Standalone Follower - Nord Archer - SeveNBase / UNP / UNPB / CBBE
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][color=#a2c4c9][b][size=5]Introduction[/size][/b][/color][/font]

Hello everyone !

English is not my native langage !

I like redhead girls, i like archer, i like Nords and i finally realised that none of my followers had any of that ! So there it is :p

Sunniva is a standalone follower that mean you dont need anything else, only my mod. I highly recommend Facelight like always !

UNP - UNPB - SeveNBase - CBBE. All weight 100. I don't plan to release another body type for now.

4K (High) and 2K (Medium) textures available.
[color=#ffe599]
[/color]

Sunniva is an archer with some perks from others trees for convenience but she mainly use bow and she's not that good with others weapons. She's fairly squishy but can wear some heavy armor because she have some Heavy Armor Perks, but not as good that her Light Armor Perks. She can also use one-handed weapon (especially sword) and use a shield. Her movespeed is a little more high than usual too and she have some sneaky attribute. You'll find her in Dead Man's Drink (Falkreath Inn).

She starts with medium gear, not too powerful but not too bad : Ancient Nord Armor and Nord Hero Bow. She will level up with the player.
[font=Georgia][color=#d0e0e3]
[/color][/font][center][font=Georgia][color=#d0e0e3][color=#a2c4c9][size=5][b]
Video[/b][/size][/color][/color][/font]
[b]
Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4575391]MetalboyII[/url][/b] [b]![/b]
[youtube]vxgw_UVJNcw[/youtube]

[b]Thanks to [/b][b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1054929]Supertin[/url][/b] [b]![/b]
[youtube]BaR2LemS_XA[/youtube][/center]

[center][/center][b][font=Georgia][size=5][color=#a2c4c9]Character [/color][/size][/font][/b]

Sunniva live from hunting, she's almost all the times in the wild of Skyrim. She don't like big citys, and crowded area, but it's easy to find her in Falkreath where she used to sells what she got from hunting and buy some foods. She's from a family of known hunters in the region and Falkreath is also her birthplace. Since she was a little girl she was destined to becoming a hunter. His Dad taught her all she know, before he left home for joigning the Stormcloack Rebellion, when she was only a teenager. She live alone now since her parents passed away some years ago, her dad is dead because of the war against the empire, since then she want to becoming stronger and leave Falkreath for exploring Skyrim and eventually joining the Stormcloak Rebellion for avenging her father dead and freed Skyrim from the Empire who she's consider to only be the puppets of the Thalmors.

[u][b]
Basic Info[/b][/u]

Name : Sunniva

Level : Lvl up with player

Marriageable : Yes

Body : UNP / UNPB / SeveNBase / CBBE ( Height 0.95 - Weight 100 )

Location : Falkreath, Dead Man's Drink

Default Outfit : 

- Ancient Nord Armor

- Nord Hero Bow / Iron banded Shield / Iron Sword

[size=4][b]Perks[/b][/size] :

[u][b][i]Archery[/i][/b][/u]

- Overdraw
- Critical Shot
- Ranger
- Powershot
- Quickshot
- Bullseye

[u][b][i]Light Armor[/i][/b][/u]

- Agile Defender
- Custom Fit
- Matching Set
- Unhindered
- Wind Walker
- Deft Movement
[u][i][b]
Heavy Armor[/b][/i][/u]

- Juggernaut
- Conditioning
- Tower of Strenght

[i][b][u]One-Handed

[/u][/b][/i]- Armsman
- Fighting Stance
- Bladesman

[u][i][b]Block

[/b][/i][/u][i]- Shield Wall[/i][u][i]

[/i][/u][u][i][b]Sneak[/b][/i][/u]

- Light Foot
- Muffled Movement
- Stealth
- Deadly Aim


[size=4][b][color=#ffe599]Q&A[/color]

[/b][/size]
Q : I want to change her outfit but she keep the default one.
A : Use any of the follower overhaul mods (AFT, UFO...) or change it in CK.


Q : She doesn't look exactly like your screenshots in my skyrim.
A : Look at Mods recommended and Mods used in screenshots, it can be caused by your enb and settings too.


Q : Is she custom voiced ?
A : No.

Q : I can't find her she don't show up..
A : Use BOSS / LOOT. Wait some hours. Try to do a new game and look if she's here (just for verify if the mod is correctly installed).

Q : halp pls!!§§§ i got blackface or purple thingy weirdz things
A : [size=2]First thing to do if Black Face : Use BOSS[/size] / LOOT[size=2] or move her esp to the bottom of load order. [/size]You can also try to load/reload your save or enter/leave a cell.

[color=#ea9999]
[/color]If it persist and you use 4K version, try to install 2k version in the download section under optional tab.


[color=#ea9999][b][u]
ONLY FOR UNPs USERS (UNP-UNPB-SEVENBASE)[/u][/b][/color]If it still here after that try to replace with low textures : [size=2]download "[/size][size=2][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1000120412]V06 SMALL[/url][/b]" from [size=2][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]Here[/url][/b][/size] and then its fairly easy. You just have to navigate to :

[/size]
[size=2][font=Georgia][color=#e69138]  [/color][/font]                                                                   Steam\SteamApps\common\skyrim\Data\Textures\Actors\Character\Sunniva
      


[/size][center][size=4][size=2]and then overwrite only 3 files, done.[/size][b]

[/b][size=2][i][b]Files to overwrite[/b][/i] :
femalebody_1.dds
femalehands_1.dds
femalehead.dds[/size][b]
[/b][/size][/center]
